name: grantsmanship
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the activity of persuading a government or organization to give you or your organization a grant (= money for a special purpose), or the ability to do this: The requirements for research, publishing, and grantsmanship were often at odds with the needs of patients. His skills included grantsmanship and fund-raising.
More examplesFewer examplesThe new generation of hardware was more reasonably priced and made digitization possible without depending on grantsmanship.These informative essays on grantsmanship could be used to guide an individual through the process of securing a grant.The moneys needed to repair the storm damage were secured from insurance, but also by undertaking additional grantsmanship.
